title: High-contrast Back to dashboard button in Yearly Summary header

requirements.summary: Restyle the Yearly Summary header “Back to dashboard” button to be high-contrast and clearly visible in both light and dark mode without changing its behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: In the Summary view (where `YearlySummaryTable` renders), the "Back to dashboard" button is clearly visible at a glance against the surrounding background.
The button remains readable and distinct in both light and dark mode (no low-contrast outline-on-background appearance).
Clicking the button still returns the user to the dashboard view (no behavior regression).

file_operations.description: Update the existing header Button styling for “Back to dashboard” to a solid, high-contrast appearance using Tailwind utility classes (no edits under `frontend/src/components/ui`). Use the shadcn-ui Button component’s supported props (e.g., switch from `variant="outline"` to a solid variant if available) plus Tailwind classes to ensure strong contrast in both light and dark mode (e.g., `bg-primary` + `text-primary-foreground`, appropriate hover/focus ring, and optional shadow). Ensure `onBackToDashboard` handler wiring remains unchanged so navigation behavior does not regress. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
